imageRetrieval

Class ImageHandle

  • java.lang.Object
    • imageRetrieval.ImageHandle

  • public class ImageHandle
extends java.lang.Object
    Container for one Image file Created by sebastian on 6/8/17.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int version 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ImageHandle(java.io.File file, java.lang.String filetype)
      Get an Image-Handle from given image-file - tries to read the "image.jpg.features" file to get the features that where previously computed - if the features file can not be read / contains old features, the features will be computed

    • Method Summary
